title: In base cage bug/hack please fix this
body:
http://matchhistory.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/EUW1/2974862981/212097483?tab=overview

If you can get replay data of this that would be nice because for the first minute i couldn't leave the base and was trapped by an invisible barrier in the fountain.

Either someone on either team hacked me or this is a bug on the new map or something.

Please fix this.

I became super useless and underpowered because of this bug/hack i tried reconnecting and i was able to reconnect around the 4 minute mark where i was underleveled, getting try harded as level 1 against a level 4 even when being safe.

replies.body:
I've seen this issue in the past and it's always been caused by a *poor connection* to the gameservers. I recommend you check our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for a list of steps that should assist in resolving this.

Let me know if those steps helped.

I dont see the steps i needed on that page.

I should also mention before this bug happened even before the loading screen for that match the graphics on the client were glitching up it was happening when i was sorting out my masteries since for some champions in some roles i have to tune em every match. when i saved my masteries the graphics just glitched all over the client sort of like NES/SNES/Genesis graphic glitch ups but the timer still went down and connected me to a match.

Loading screen phase seemed to be fine then when the match started all my allies were out of base but i was trapped in?

I did start blaming someone thinking i was getting hacked was in a bit of a blind rage over this sadly :(.

thanks for the fast response.

The graphics issue you described in the client is pretty worrying, since that may be caused by hardware issues with your computer. You'll have to let me know if you see that again.

As for the issue of being stuck in the fountain, basically what this seems like is that your packets to the servers that contain the data in your right-clicks to leave the base weren't received by the servers. This could make the clicks not actually send data for the action to take place, meaning it's a problem somewhere between your PC and the servers. This is why I suggested the connection guide and why I believe we'll find the solution with the steps I've provided. 

Please let me know if you see this issue again after taking those steps.

I've book marked this page if i do come across this i will let you know.

its a bit annoying honestly and im just glad im not using beta client.

If something happens with the same issue before jan 2017 i will let you know.

Merry Christmas.
